articles.content:

articles.title: Jodie Cooper and Pauline Menczer took different paths to the top, but faced the same macho surfing culture - ABC News
articles.description: In the rough-as-guts Bondi breaks of the 1980s, rising surf stars Pauline Menczer and Jodie Cooper both discovered it wasn't only big waves that could wipe you out.
articles.content:
